definitions.definition: A heterocyclic base , 4- amino pyrimidin -2(1 H )- one , which pairs with guanine in DNA and RNA (by means of three hydrogen bonds ).

main_definition: ( biochemistry ) A heterocyclic base , 4- amino pyrimidin -2(1 H )- one , which pairs with guanine in DNA and RNA (by means of three hydrogen bonds ).
